entry.title: Sunday: Showers. High 13.
entry.summary: Showers ending this afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Wind west 20 km/h. High 13. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Showers. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers this evening. A few showers beginning late this evening. Risk of a thunderstorm late this evening. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023
